014package org.jdbi.v3.core.internal;
015
016import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
017import java.util.function.Consumer;
018import java.util.function.Supplier;
019
020public class Invocations {
021    private Invocations() {
022        throw new UtilityClassException();
023    }
024
025    public static <V, L> V invokeWith(ThreadLocal<L> backing, L context, Callable<V> task) throws Exception {
026        return invokeWith(
027            backing::get,
028            value -> {
029                if (value == null) {
030                    backing.remove();
031                } else {
032                    backing.set(value);
033                }
034            },
035            context,
036            task
037        );
038    }
039
040    public static <V, L> V invokeWith(Supplier<L> initial, Consumer<L> becoming, L taskContext, Callable<V> task) throws Exception {
041        L original = initial.get();
042        try {
043            becoming.accept(taskContext);
044            return task.call();
045        } finally {
046            becoming.accept(original);
047        }
048    }
049}
